rules_text:
Devour artifact and/or creature 1 [i](As this enters, you may sacrifice any number of artifacts and/or creatures. This creature enters with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)[/i]
Nourish X, where X is the number of permanents Feasting Wildlife devoured. [i](When this creature enters, put X +1/+1 counters on it or create X colorless Food artifact tokens with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
notes:
New card — Replaced Amsburg Zealot

With Livestock Guardian softcore taking Zealot’s role in the uncommons, this slot opens up for a big creature that can convert your artifacts into food, or just devour a bunch of stuff to grow huge.
